Articles.Content:
rules: make them realistic, have fun, no swearing.

how to play:

name a country(make it kerbalized)

name a payload(make it kerbalized and like the country)

name a launcher(like above)

example:

kussia(russia)

koyuz

kerminov 1

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T02:12:04Z" title="05/04/2015 02:12  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by jake9039**

Kritan. (obvious)

Nuklear satellite thing to change orbit of minmus.

rocket mark 420.

MLGtopia

Doritos

Mountain Dew Delivery Vehicle (MDDV)
